content.description:
The next questions refer to the song lyrics below.

“To Versailles like bragging lads

We brought with us all our guns

We had to show, though we were but women,

A courage that no one can reproach us for.

Now we won’t have to go so far

When we want to see our King.

We love him with a love without equal,

Since he’s come to live in our Capital.”

Song of the poissardes (Paris market women), October 1789
content.question: The participation of women such as the poissardes led to which of the following during the early phases of the French Revolution?

choices.label: Permanent legal equality for women, but no political rights
Temporary improvements in women’s legal status
Loss of rights previously held by women

content.answer: Temporary improvements in women’s legal status

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
